name: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament
description: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament (GHBT) is a shooting game, players against players, up to 8 players online or up to 4 players in split screen. The online mode works by Steam friends invitation. There is no matchmaking. In the GHBT, you control a customizable ball that moves around with a grappling hook. Play against your friends on 6 unique maps. Welcome to the arena!
